channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hosting my first Blog with Hugo on Github! For a starter, I’ll document in this post how the blog is managed and used. I’ve setup the site by referring to here, and here. The first link is particularly useful. And I’ve adopted its file structure for setting up privately managed (/blog) and public sites (/public). It also gives a shell script which automatically regenerates the static site based on contents in /blog.
